Write-Up Text: People took to social media to express their thoughts on the upcoming federal budget set to be delivered by Jim Chalmers MP next week. The highly anticipated announcement of a significant pay rise for aged care workers has generated a considerable amount of buzz with over $11 billion to be allocated. There is also growing concern over the potential negative impact on the ABC network while the prospect of a migration system overhaul under the Labor government is gaining attention. Some continue to criticize the stage 3 tax cuts put forth by the Morrison government and its impact on the budget surplus.
